item.title: Technological Ramifications
item.description: We all know technological advancements have been drastically changing human lives, from extending our lifespan to ease of many tasks we now take for granted. Technology is so intertwined with our lives right now that it’s hard to imagine life without modern conveniences. So what are these Ramifications of Technology and how has it affected our lives beyond its marvellous breakthroughs? Dividing this into 3 parts Psychological effects Physical changes Social Adaptation Also wrote about Exposure of kids to youtube / social media at a very young age

item.title: Shepherd, Sheep and Legs
item.description: Came across this while reading a book: Story is about a little sheep in a Shepherd’s flock, This little sheep liked to wander off and Mr.Shepherd after noticing it couple times broke off all his legs (brutal right). Aren’t shephered supposed to love sheep? Now he holds this 4 legged broken sheep everywhere around his neck, feeding, washing and taking care of everything and when finally the sheep is ready to go.
